content: these mitts are wonderful for keeping baby s hands warm while still allowing him or her to explore their world with their little fingers i have found they also are great for absorbing alot of the drool each mitt is worked in one continuous piece - no sewing involved unless you choose to attach buttons and only 2 ends to weave in skill level beginner/easy sizes small baby medium toddler large large toddler/small child materials required dk/sport weight yarn i recommend katia bamboo f 3 75mm and g 4 25mm hooks needle the buttons are optional and just for decoration the pattern is a pdf file it prints out to one page
